A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you hate this movie\, that's fine. You're entitled to your opinion. But from my perspective\, I don't get the hate for this film. Especially considering the reason people hated Force Awakens was because it was too similar\, now this film is too different? Anyway...This film is absolutely amazing. This is the most unique Star Wars film of all time. It makes the Star Wars universe feel different in a way that the prequels didn't do that well (and that's coming from someone who does fairly enjoy the prequels). Amazing acting\, amazing action\, unexpected twists\, great score\, and overall a fun time. As far as flaws\, I'm conflicted by the way Snoke was used AND the side plot involving Finn & Rose could've been cut down a little. OVERALL GRADE = A
